OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IConfigurationService Interface Reference

This service helps to automate the remote grid mode for users so that they do not have to input so many URLs. More...

void RemoveUrls (string key)
 Remove the URLs that we have for this key.

Detailed Description

This service helps to automate the remote grid mode for users so that they do not have to input so many URLs.

List<string> OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IConfigurationService.FindValueOf ( string  userID,
string  user2,
string  key 
)

Find the 'key' from the auto config service. First it will check for the key in the response it got from the ConfigurationInHandler, then check from the IConfig found in 'Configuration'.

Parameters:
userID The user who is requesting this info
userID The another way to check who is requesting this info
key A generic key to check for URLs
Returns:
A list of URLs that are registered for this key
List<string> OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IConfigurationService.FindValueOf ( string  userID,
string  key,
bool  returnAllPossible 
)

Find the 'key' from the auto config service. First it will check for the key in the response it got from the ConfigurationInHandler, then check from the IConfig found in 'Configuration'.

Parameters:
userID The user who is requesting this info
key A generic key to check for URLs
returnAllPossible Return all possible URLs that could be used for the user, not only the user's home (if it exists)
Returns:
A list of URLs that are registered for this key
